name: Kronos 6
description:
Pseudo 3 (2.5D) science-fiction dungeon crawl/adventure game. Made in Gdevelop5. for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2021.

Controls:

movement - WASD

turn - Q, E

interact - SPACE

Using items:

light - L

map - M

flare gun - F

or click on the item.

IMPORTANT NOTE: currently game contains some bugs, most important one is this - intro, outro and game over screen doesnt work as they should, you have to relaunch the whole game if you want to play it again...
